price: 35. Raba inuu idin kaga saaro dhulkiinna sixirkiisa, ee maxaad ku talineysaan?
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum bisiḥ'rihi famādhā tamurūna
